home.title: Anna Hálová | Painter
home.description: Anna Hálová - Czech painter. Portfolio of oil paintings, watercolors and ink drawings.
intro: Here I share with you my passion for painting. In a painting, I feel, I can express what is unfolding in the field of perception.
I have been painting since childhood. Along the way I tried drawing and printmaking, sculpture, media, writing – and returned to what I love most.

There is not much to write about. No grand thinking, sketches or preparations. I paint when it comes to me. I don't know the next stroke myself, nor the final form of the work. Creation is a wondrous Moment; a living, pulsating pause.
For me, painting is an adventurous journey. Come with me for a while and take a look..
